paintBorder(Component, Graphics, int, int, int, int) - Method in class utilities.RoundedCornerBorder

Person - Class in logic
Represents a person with contact information.
Person(boolean, String[]) - Constructor for class logic.Person
Constructs a new Person instance intended for creating a new user with only name and surname specified.
Person(String[], String) - Constructor for class logic.Person
Constructs a new Person instance with a specified unique identifier, used for users with known IDs.
Person(String[], User) - Constructor for class logic.Person
Constructs a new Person instance with automatically generated unique identifier (UUID) for the person and their associated user.
Person(String[], User, String) - Constructor for class logic.Person
Constructs a new Person instance with a specified unique identifier for the person.
PersonPanel - Class in utilities
A custom JPanel that represents a single person's information along with interactive SVG buttons for contact management.
PersonPanel(Person) - Constructor for class utilities.PersonPanel
Constructs a PersonPanel for the specified Person object.
PhoneAction - Class in logic
Provides static utility methods for actions related to Users and Persons, such as searching, adding, editing, and deleting, by interfacing with the DatabaseManager.
PhoneAction() - Constructor for class logic.PhoneAction
 
Phonebook - Class in logic
The Phonebook class provides a console-based interface for managing a phonebook application.
Phonebook() - Constructor for class logic.Phonebook
Default constructor for Phonebook.
Phonebook(User) - Constructor for class logic.Phonebook
Constructs a new Phonebook instance associated with a specific user.
PhonebookFrame - Class in gui
 
PhonebookFrame() - Constructor for class gui.PhonebookFrame
Constructs a PhonebookFrame and initializes the user interface components.
PhoneBookTest - Class in main
The PhoneBookTest class contains a suite of static methods to test the functionality of the Phonebook application.
PhoneBookTest() - Constructor for class main.PhoneBookTest
